Articles.Content:
Hello

First of all, let me say how excited I am to be playing this game with all of you.  Second of all, I can't believe it has been out for five years and I am just now noticing this game.  How many times have you heard that one before?  I haven't been this excited since I got into Minecraft.

A bit about me: I have three kids.  Between my family and work, I don't know how I am going to sink the time into this game!  I am excited about the seeming limitless nature of this game.  The tutorials are already blowing my mind, and have already taught me so much (i.e. Orbiting is a free fall in which you are going too fast to hit the ground).

Look forward to connecting with you guys on the forums.  Thank you in advance for being noob friendly.

 

Steve
I have 942 hours total on this game since February 2014. I managed to balance the time with school, punishments, and "different eras" with little problems. You should be fine my man.

Hello rabidchild, and welcome to the forum!  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
